messages.content: Write the lyrics of a song in the style of the band Ghost. It needs to talk about Anakin's turn to the darks side and be titled "Rise"

Verse 1:
Anakin was once a Jedi boy
With a bright future ahead of him, he was still a hero
But slowly, his powers began to fade
He became a Sith apprentice, a dark side slayer
Chorus:
Rise up, Anakin
You'll be the leader of the dark side
You'll rule over the galaxy, the galaxy of the dark side
With your lightsaber, your blade and your power, your strength and your fear
Rise up, Anakin, and help us fight
Verse 2:
Anakin was once a Jedi boy
With a bright future ahead of him, he was still a hero
But slowly, his powers began to fade
He became a Sith apprentice, a dark side slayer
With your lightsaber, your blade and your power, your strength and your fear
Rise up, Anakin, and help us fight
Chorus:
Rise up, Anakin
You'll be the leader of the dark side
You'll rule over the galaxy, the galaxy of the dark side
With your lightsaber, your blade and your power, your strength and your fear
Rise up, Anakin, and help us fight
Bridge:
Anakin was once a Jedi boy
With a bright future ahead of him, he was still a hero
But slowly, his powers began to fade
He became a Sith apprentice, a dark side slayer
Can you add chords in the style of Ultimate Guitar?

Sure, here are the chords for "Rise" in the style of Ultimate Guitar:

Format it using markdown, one line should contain the chords, the next one should contain the lyrics.
